dialogues.text: Here on Azureal Island, we all make sure we contribute to the community one way or another.
You should speak to the locals. They will be happy to help you on your way.

options.text: What can I do around here?
I would like to learn more about your ways.

dialogues.text: Well, we primarily fish. There are some fishing docks south of here, but you will need a fishing rod. My husband is handing one out to travellers who help him.
Isn't that lovely! If you wish to, I suppose you should talk to Elder Selwyn. His house is north of the mayor's house.
Oh, Douglas sent you to bring me 5 fish? He must have been busy then. I'm glad you could find the time to help out!
Thank you so much, dear! Please accept this reward for all your efforts.
